name: tslint-package
description: bundling of all packages needed for tslint to work

scripts.validatePublishReadiness: git diff --exit-code && ncu -u --packageFile package.json && npm install
scripts.pubMin: npm run validatePublishReadiness && npm version minor && git push && npm publish
scripts.pubPatch: npm run validatePublishReadiness && npm version patch && git push && npm publish
scripts.updateAndCommit: npm run validatePublishReadiness && npm run update2latest && npm run test && git commit -am "u2l"
scripts.update2latestAndPublishMinor: npm run updateAndCommit && npm run pubMin
scripts.update2latestAndPublishPath: npm run updateAndCommit && npm run pubPatch

author: Corno
